desc: Handmade, custom, sport karate weapons made in the USA. We make all your training and competition weapons. Competition Bo Staff in every size, speed nunchucks, Kamas, and even demo katanas! Martial Arts weapons made by Martial Arts for Martial Artist, design your Ultimate Weapons today!

layout.text: Worlds Largest Custom Martial Arts Weapons Creator
Design you own weapons. Modify grip, color, size and even add your own logo.
